Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

returns.hero: The hero who has opened given NG_LEVE first
returns.heroId: ID of the hero who has opened given NG_LEVE first
returns.tsOpen: Timestamp of the moment of opening of the given NG_LEVEL

increaseRevision(address).details: Revision should be increased on each contract upgrade

isController(address).details: Return true if given address is controller

params.user: Owner of the hero who has passed the dungeon
Owner of the hero who has taken participation in the PvP

VERSION.details: Should be incremented when contract changed

controller().notice: Return controller address saved in the contract slot

isGovernance(address).notice: Return true if given address is setup as governance in Controller

registerFameHallHero(address,uint256,uin.notice: Register the hero who has opened given NG_LEVE first in the Hall of Fame

registerPassedDungeon(address).notice: Register daily activity - a dungeon was passed

registerPvP(address,bool).notice: Register daily activity - PvP was made
